headline: HII to Host Second Quarter Earnings Conference Call and Webcast on July 31
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., July 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) will release its second quarter 2025 financial results on Thursday, July 31, and host an earnings conference call at 9 a.m. Eastern time the same day. The call will be webcast live on HII’s website: https://www.hii.com/. HII participants will include Chris Kastner, president and CEO, and Tom Stiehle, executive vice president and chief financial officer.
